CIPHER.7.cipherString: When your future arrives, will you blame your past?

CIPHER.11.cipherString: Some folks look at me and see a certain swagger, which in Texas is called 'walking.'
CIPHER.11.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: Without this playing with fantasy no creative work has ever yet come to birth. The debt we owe to the play of the imagination is incalculable.
CIPHER.12.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: I don't just come from a musical family, but from a musical community.
CIPHER.13.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
CIPHER.14.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: Anytime a person goes into a delicatessen and orders a pastrami on white bread, somewhere a Jew dies.
CIPHER.15.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.16.cipherString: Freedom was the desire of our people throughout centuries. Freedom enabled our people to be owners of their destiny.
CIPHER.16.question: Encode this sentence with the Caesar cipher with offset 4.

CIPHER.17.cipherString: Food is a necessary component to life. People can live without Renoir, Mozart, Gaudi, Beckett, but they cannot live without food.
CIPHER.17.question: Encode this sentence with the Caesar cipher with offset 19.

CIPHER.18.cipherString: A kiss can be a comma, a question mark or an exclamation point. That's basic spelling that every woman ought to know.

CIPHER.19.cipherString: I love to go to the studio and stay there 10 or 12 hours a day. I love it. What is it? I don't know. It's life.

CIPHER.20.cipherString: I love my daddy. My daddy's everything. I hope I can find a man that will treat me as good as my dad.

CIPHER.21.cipherString: I've given it my all. I've done my best. Now, I'm ready with my family to begin the next phase of our lives.
CIPHER.21.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.22.cipherString: When you discover your mission, you will feel its demand. It will fill you with enthusiasm and a burning desire to get to work on it.
CIPHER.22.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,12).

CIPHER.23.cipherString: A wonderful fact to reflect upon, that every human creature is constituted to be that profound secret and mystery to every other.

CIPHER.24.cipherString: I think that's exactly what Silicon Valley was all about in those days. Let's do a startup in our parents' garage and try to create a business.
CIPHER.24.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,17).

CIPHER.25.cipherString: Accuracy is the twin brother of honesty; inaccuracy, of dishonesty.

CIPHER.26.cipherString: Treat people as if they were what they ought to be and you help them to become what they are capable of being.

CIPHER.27.cipherString: Get all the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything.
CIPHER.27.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,17).

CIPHER.28.cipherString: I just don't know how to deal with so many people giving me that much affection. I never had that in my life.
CIPHER.28.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,4).

CIPHER.29.cipherString: There are no constraints on the human mind, no walls around the human spirit, no barriers to our progress except those we ourselves erect.
CIPHER.29.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,8).

CIPHER.30.cipherString: At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well, and talk well but not too wisely.

CIPHER.31.cipherString: We need to ask whether, in the long term, some individuals with a history of psychosis may do better off medication.

CIPHER.32.cipherString: I just want to live in peace and quiet.
